1.text: Then Jonah prayed unto the LORD his God out of the fishâ€™s belly.

2.text: And he said, I called by reason of mine affliction unto the LORD, and he answered me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice.

3.text: For thou didst cast me into the depth, in the heart of the seas, and the flood was round about me; all thy waves and thy billows passed over me.

4.text: And I said, am cast out from before thine eyes; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.

5.text: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul; the deep was round about me; the weeds were wrapped about my head.

6.text: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars closed upon me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from the pit, O LORD my God.

7.text: When my soul fainted within me, I remembered the LORD: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.

8.text: They that regard lying vanities forsake their own mercy.

9.text: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay that which I have vowed. Salvation is of the LORD.

10.text: And the LORD spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.
